title: The Color Between Black and White
description: Doctors see dark spots on films. Escaping this, Girl meets a dark knight. Before escaping his dark shadows, Girl meets her white knight. And a few more white coats. Near death, Girl experiences a white light. Girl mixes Black and White, but instead of gray...gets BRIGHT. Bite-sized chapters waiting for you at the end of your day! Only for the smart, sexy, funny types who don't take themselves too seriously.
author: S.C. Russell
